content: Researchers at the Gorilla Foundation have to spell out words like "c-a-n-d-y" and "g-u-m" when Koko is nearby.
translations: ita:I ricercatori alla Gorilla Foundation devono sillabare parole come 'c-a-n-d-y' e 'g-u-m' quando Koko Ã¨ nelle vicinanze
